citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
citations.narrative:
**Several expired medications were found in the Vet Med Dept lock box during inspection. The following expired
medications were noted:
-Euthasol solution, Lot #3861, expiration 1/2016, 2 vials
-Euthasol solution, Lot #E0153, expiration 7/2016, 1 vial
**Expired medications should not be used in the treatment of regulated animals. Expired medications should be
either clearly labeled as expired or disposed of in a proper manner. It is the responsibility of the IACUC to ensure
that the methods utilized in the prevention and treatment of diseases and/or injuries are in accordance with
established standard veterinary practices and the regulatory requirements of the Animal Welfare Act.
CORRECTION:IMMEDIATELY
THE INSPECTION AND EXIT BRIEFING WAS CONDUCTED WITH FACILITY REPRESENTATIVES.
